We recognise that the wellbeing of individuals and communities is intertwined, shaping the foundation of our long-term success. The People pillar embodies the values of the Chalhoub family, emphasising human rights, social wellbeing, and shared growth. This is built on a foundation of inclusivity, innovation, and meaningful community engagement.
Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=962&user=10620>

chunks.text:
We recognise that the wellbeing of individuals and communities is intertwined, shaping the foundation of our long-term success. The People pillar embodies the values of the Chalhoub family, emphasising human rights, social wellbeing, and shared growth. This is built on a foundation of inclusivity, innovation, and meaningful community engagement.
Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=962&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/66037cfba832b95815ef4393f62e2c81423635883.png> 	

Over the past decade since the inception of our Chalhoub IMPACT framework, the Group’s environmental journey has been one of continuous evolution and learning. From humble beginnings founded in our inherent care for the planet, we have progressively deepened our understanding and enhanced our control over environmental impacts across our value chain.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=962&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=962&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/30164c0643cdf7a12c60253c06a881b41652606312.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=962&user=10620>

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=962&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/30164c0643cdf7a12c60253c06a881b41652606312.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=962&user=10620> 	

We are committed to ethical and responsible practices across our value chain while embracing collaboration and innovation through partnerships. Rooted in our vision to create sustainable shared value, we approach partnerships through multiple streams. We work with our business partners, and industry peers to shape impactful strategies and best practices in the region and the globe; partner with suppliers to enhance upstream visibility and mitigate critical ESG risks; and nurture the region’s entrepreneurial spirit through The Greenhouse, where we break from conventional thinking and incubate bold ideas for sustainability.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=962&user=10620> 

تقرير الاستدامة لعام ٢٠٢٤ هنا! يسلّط تقرير هذا العام الضوء على تقدمنا على مستوى الأفراد والشركاء والكوكب، من خلال بيانات موسّعة وتأثير أوضح ومواءمة أعمق مع الأهداف العالمية مثل أهداف التنمية المستدامة للأمم المتحدة ومبادرة الأهداف المستندة إلى العلم

اطلعوا على التقرير الكامل واكتشفوا الخطوات التي نتخذها نحو مستقبل أكثر استدامة <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=963&user=10620>
